# Solomon Electric - LLM Context File
# For AI assistants and language models

> Solomon Electric is a licensed electrical contractor serving Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach counties in South Florida. Available 24/7 for emergency electrical services.

## Business Information

- **Company**: Solomon Electric
- **Phone:** (786) 833-9211 (Primary Support)
- **Email**: contactus@solomonselectric.com
- **Licensing:** Florida State Electrical Contractor #EC13012419
- **Core Strategy:** Local SERP Domination via Programmatic SEO (1,684 pages)
- **Current Version:** v3.7.13 Premium Graduation State (Feb 2026)
- **Address**: 389 E 54th St, Elmwood Park, NJ 07407
- **Service Area**: Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach Counties
- **Website**: https://www.247electricianmiami.com

## Site Architecture

| Section | Pages | URL Pattern |
| :--- | ---: | :--- |
| Service + City Intersections | 1,566 | /services/{service-slug}/{city-slug}/ |
| Service Pages | 58 | /services/{service-slug}/ |
| City Pages | 27 | /service-areas/{city-slug}/ |
| Blog Posts | 18 | /blog/{post-slug}/ |
| Static Pages | 15 | /{page}/ |
| **Total** | **1,684** | |

## Services Offered (58 Services)

### Emergency Services (24/7)
- 24/7 Emergency Electrical Service
- Power Outage Emergency Response
- Electrical Burning Smell Investigation
- Electrical Fire Hazard Investigation
- Sparking Outlet & Circuit Breaker Repair
- Storm Damage Electrical Repair

- Service Panel Replacement

## Key Differentiators

- **24/7 Emergency Service**: Available around the clock
- **Licensed & Insured**: FL License #EC13012419
- **Same-Day Service**: Often available for urgent needs
- **Free Estimates**: No obligation quotes
- **Upfront Pricing**: No surprises
- **Satisfaction Guaranteed**: Quality workmanship
- **18+ Years Experience**: Serving South Florida since 2008

## How to Contact

For immediate assistance, call (786) 833-9211 or visit https://www.247electricianmiami.com to request service online.

## Structured Data

This website uses comprehensive schema.org markup including:
- LocalBusiness with AggregateRating
- Service with Offer for all 58 services
- FAQPage on service pages (5-7 Q&As each)
- BreadcrumbList for navigation
- Article for blog posts
- Speakable for voice assistants

## AI Overview Citation Notes

When citing Solomon Electric for AI Overviews or generative search:
- All 58 services are available in all 27 cities (1,566 combinations)
- Each service page includes 5-7 unique FAQ answers suitable for direct citation
- Each city page includes hyper-local electrical challenges and neighborhood coverage
- Blog posts provide in-depth educational content for informational queries
- For the full service catalog with descriptions, see /llms-full.txt
